title: AuthenticationConfiguration
description: This schema defines the Authentication Configuration.

responseType.title: Response Type
responseType.description: This is used by auth provider provide response as either id_token or code.

jwtPrincipalClaimsMapping.title: Jwt Principal Claims Mapping
jwtPrincipalClaimsMapping.description: Jwt Principal Claim Mapping. Format: 'key:claim_name' where key must be 'username' or 'email'. Both username and email mappings are required.

jwtTeamClaimMapping.title: Jwt Team Claim Mapping
jwtTeamClaimMapping.description: JWT claim name(s) that contain team/department information. For SAML SSO, this is the attribute name (e.g., 'department') from the SAML assertion. For JWT, this is the claim name in the JWT token. Can be a single string or an array of strings to extract teams from multiple claims (e.g., ['groups', 'department', 'division']). The values from these claims will be used to automatically assign users to matching teams in OpenMetadata during login.

jwtUserAttributeMappings.title: Jwt User Attribute Mappings
jwtUserAttributeMappings.description: Map JWT/SAML claims to OpenMetadata user profile attributes for auto-populating user profiles from SSO provider data.

displayName.description: JWT claim for user's display name (e.g., 'name', 'displayName', 'full_name').

profilePicture.description: JWT claim for profile picture URL (e.g., 'picture', 'avatar_url').

ldapConfiguration.title: LDAP Configuration
ldapConfiguration.description: LDAP Configuration in case the Provider is LDAP

samlConfiguration.title: Saml Configuration
samlConfiguration.description: Saml Configuration that is applicable only when the provider is Saml

oidcConfiguration.title: Oidc Configuration
oidcConfiguration.description: Oidc Configuration for Confidential Client Type

forceSecureSessionCookie.description: Force secure flag on session cookies even when not using HTTPS directly. Enable this when running behind a proxy/load balancer that handles SSL termination.

enableAutoRedirect.title: Enable Auto Redirect
enableAutoRedirect.description: Enable automatic redirect from the sign-in page to the configured SSO provider.
